Gems of Old England
Ruardean, Gloucestershire Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £6. March contest 1st Bream, 2nd Yorkley Onward. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2012, 1:58 p.m. Dec. 14, 2018, 1:14 p.m.
